response.answer_text: Lucius Fox does not build Batmans gadgets unless Chris Nolan is your long lost father. it’s mostly due to how Lucius has Military Protocol that Batman GETS his gadgets, but building them with cool functions is Bruces own job for the most part. (Superman/Batman #85) both scans:   Which is no surprise to say the least, Batman is literally one of the most intelligent and naturally gifted minds in DC whose IQ extends up to 200+. Ozymandias words: (Doomsday Clock #2)  I’m more than 100% sure, he invents and manufactures his own tech.

I’ve always thought they were developed by Lucius Fox, and Wayne Tech, through a number of shell corporations… I’m sure Bruce Wayne has a LOT of input on design, functionality, etc., but there must be a small cadre of dedicated techs who actually put the devices together… I also recall a short story called “Neutral Ground”, about a store where all of Gotham’s heroes/villains can go and get gear without fear of getting arrested (I seem to remember Batman walking past the Riddler, while Riddler is yelling at a tailor about the number of questions marks on his outfit)… Hope this helps… Here’s an earlier Quora response to the same question… Where does Batman get his gadgets from?
